data.name: Bura: The Way the Wind Blows
data.detailed_description:
Join me and explore freely around this seemingly usual, but island full of mysteries.
Unravel the vivid magical world beneath the surface as the old-folk tales you're told come to life
Play at your own pace, enjoying the small details of Adria and feel connected to the people around you.



A tale about growing up, relying on the community to overcome challenges, and connecting with the spirit of the Adriatic wilderness. Learn Croatian and Mediterranean legends first-hand from the creatures that inhabit them and discover lost cultural monuments and traditions.




The game focuses on dialogue, inspired by classic TTRPGs such as D&D, striving to give the player a similar experience. It also uses a “character sheet” where you’ll level up your character and upgrade her stats.
The unique dialogue system relies on character stats and traits, as well as environmental factors such as weather, time of day, or even menstrual cycle.




In Dalmatia, the weather changes suddenly and it heavily impacts the character’s mood and even triggers health problems. Sometimes quests will arise due to the weather, and sometimes your mission will be blocked by it. Due to this, there will never be two identical playthroughs as weather is procedurally generated by an in-depth system using probability curves throughout the year.




Bond with your playable character as you play. She has her own thoughts and opinions and will not hesitate to give feedback on your choices.
Every time you go to sleep, Rina will make notes in her journal and sketch the area she explored that day. As she does that, you will have the opportunity to upgrade her abilities.




Live as part of a symbiotic community where everyone has a part to play and contribution to make. Do your part to help the village progress, but remember you're still just one person and your influence is limited.
You can’t change the world on your own, but you can impact other characters and change their behavior. Together you might be able to make a change.

data.short_description: Explore the beautiful Adriatic coast, live as part of a small community and roam among the spirits of Mediterranean old-folk tales. Level up your character and make meaningful choices as the legends you're told come to life. Every decision is important, truth or lie, it is on you to decide.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
